userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Inventaire general de tous ses biens fait par notaires à Paris, à sa requ`ete et à celle de son beau-frère, Gabriel Guibert, Gabriel Guibert, Marquis de Bouville, M0334, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: General inventory of belongings made by notaries of Paris at Courvoisin's request, and at the request of his brother-in-law, Gabriel Guibert, Marquis de Bouville.
